title: Didone ID please ???
content:
Was having a bit of trouble with this one.  
Would appreciate some help. Sorry about the small image size, it’s all I could get.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201100657im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/f7bb_1_3705.JPG)

 [‹ What's this font? only a few letters...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201100657/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48953 "Go to previous forum topic") [Ryder Cup website - ID please? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201100657/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49432 "Go to next forum topic")
author: smongey

comments.content: I think it’s ITC Firenze, not available in digital form as far as I know.

I have several similar alteratives already, thanks Stephen. I was just curious because I couldn’t find a digital version of this face.

Thanks Jan for the ID.
There used to be a digital version from the now defunct [Image Club Graphics](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201100657/http:/cg.scs.carleton.ca/~luc/ICG.txt).
Strange. I wonder why Monotype hasn’t re-released it.
The Hutch might shed some light on that.
It is out there digitally, but only, to the best of my knowledge, bundled on (older?) CorelDraw CDs — complete with an ITC copyright.
I think that is where my copy came from, yes.

Tracked down a copy. Here we are

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201100657im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Picture4_6437.png)
  
Looks a bit squished on the image I posted initially.
